definition: A social unit consisting of individuals who are related by blood, marriage, or adoption, typically living together and sharing resources, responsibilities, and emotional bonds. It is commonly used to refer to a group of people who are connected by familial ties and live together as a household.

examples.german: Wir haben ein Familientreffen am Wochenende.
examples.english: We have a family gathering this weekend.

examples.german: Meine Familie und ich gehen oft zusammen in den Park.
examples.english: My family and I often go to the park together.

examples.german: Familie ist das Wichtigste im Leben.
examples.english: Family is the most important thing in life.

examples.german: Ich habe eine enge Beziehung zu meiner Familie.
examples.english: I have a close relationship with my family.
